title: [Large-Scale] Customized Mathematics Education Design Based on Learning Analytics: Optimization Using Equations, Statistics, and Graphs

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (algebra, geometry, statistics) and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Case-driven instructional design to strengthen workplace relevance for current professionals: utilizes real classroom mathematics problem-solving cases (student-specific error pattern analysis, graph interpretation skill enhancement strategies).

learning_goals: Identify individual math learning patterns (e.g., equation-solving time, accuracy in statistics problems) with over 80% accuracy using learning analytics tools.
Design and apply a personalized feedback system based on learning data (problem-solving records, error pattern analysis) at least three times.
Analyze formative assessment results (e.g., function graph interpretation, probability calculation error patterns) and implement learning path adjustments with over 90% participation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
